product_name: Mammut Tusk superDRY 9.8mm x 70m Dry Rope
long_description: The Mammut Tusk superDRY(TM) rope melds high strength, minimal weight, comfortable handling and long life expectancy. Lightweight 9.8mm diameter makes the Tusk a great choice for alpine climbs with a long approach; also suitable for sport climbing at the local crag. superDRY(TM) sheath and core treatment protects against water and dirt, thereby increasing the durability of the rope; also maintains smooth handling characteristics. Kernmantle design combines durable braided sheath and shock-absorbent core for protection from fall forces. 70m length allows for extended leads and rappels on today's modern sport routes. Middle of the rope is marked with a black bar to facilitate rappels. Mammut Tusk rope meets UIAA tests for falls, impact force and elongation.
short_description: The Mammut Tusk superDRY(TM) rope melds high strength, minimal weight, comfortable handling and long life expectancy.
